sent.orig: Meanwhile, in the postwar decades, the west underwent a series of consumer revolutions.
sent.trans: 而与此同时，西方在战后数十年经历了一连串的消费者革命。

sent.orig: Meanwhile, Israeli-Palestinian clashes in the West Bank continued.
sent.trans: 同时，西海岸的以巴冲突仍在继续。

sent.orig: Meanwhile he is the honour member and mascot of King Guard.
sent.trans: 这只企鹅是挪威国王卫队的荣誉成员和吉祥物。

sent.orig: It widens students' knowledge and horizons, and meanwhile cultivates their independence and personalities.
sent.trans: 能够扩展学生的知识和视野，同时也可以培养一个人的独立性。

sent.orig: Meanwhile, the swing model of fish tail fin is established and simplified.
sent.trans: 对鱼的尾鳍摆动进行了力学建模，并加以简化。
